about_the_game:
Take a deep breath and submerge yourself in the immersive sounds and music of Shinsekai: Into the Depths!

The 75+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
